subject: Order not been Shipped
description_text:
Good evening,

I bought the pre-sale for the new h-pattern/sequential shifter on December 5th and I still haven’t gotten any email about it shipping or being delayed or anything.
The order number is:

#SSN4462

I was just hoping to get some insight into what’s happening with it. I’m assuming sales were good and it’s just behind. Let me know!

Thank you and Merry Christmas!

Jayson Maas

conversations.body_text: Hi Jayson Maas,  Latest production update: The HS Pro shifter will be shipped on December 29. The schedule was slightly delayed due to issues with components before shipment.
